europeana:record.dc:title: A new species of the genus Shelfordia Cameron (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) with very long ovipositor, from NE India
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae; Braconinae; Shelfordia; Rostraulax; Sigalphogastra; Cratobracon; new species; Indo-Australian; Sikkim
europeana:record.dc:description: A new species of the Indo-Australian genus Shelfordia Cameron, 1902, viz. S longicaudata spec. nov. from Sikkim (India) with an exceptionally long ovipositor is described and illustrated. The Shelfordiagroup is not recognized, and the genus Rostraulax Quicke, 1984, is synonymized with Shelfordia.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A new species of the genus Shelfordia Cameron (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) with very long ovipositor, from NE India (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 67) (Issue 27)
